title: The Busy Pond
description: In The Busy Pond, a boy sees many animals and plants when he goes to the pond. He notices what each animal is doing and what the plants look like. Repetitive text, high-frequency words, and supportive pictures make this book perfect for emerging readers.
meta: busy, cattails, lily pads, pond, turtles, water
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sound /p/
Nouns : Identify nouns as naming words
High-Frequency Words : Identify and write the high-frequency word they

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
